name: Buccaneer (itch) (achagames)
description:
A student project made alongside Luis Arguiles Marquez, Joanna Boerner, and Gabe Gershman-Walch.

In Buccaneer, you will set sail across the high seas in search of gold to plunder! Merchant ships are the easiest targets, but navy ships won't let you sink them without a fight! With your vast riches, return to your pirate hideout to stash your gold and purchase upgrades for your ship! Collect as much gold as you can while the navy armada grows ever larger!
